title: Why cant I install?
body:
Why is it I cant install the game? I did a full recovery on my computer and i was installing the game and it gets to about 40% and it keeps saying an error has occurred please go to the logs or what not. I really wanna play the game. Can you please help me with this please? 

Summoner name is XeroDusk

replies.body:
Yes I'm still having problems. 

Still says

Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information. 

I'm really upset about this. I had league on this laptop before. Now it's not wanting to install.

Running into issues patching at the 40% point is an indication that your patcher is disconnecting from the patching servers. Since local network settings are the most common culprit, I recommend working through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most frequent fixes. 

Let me know if you still have issues after working through that guide.
